title: stuff bout the kids who got killed
review: At the beginning of the movie one of the guys who got interviewed says 7 kids got killed but another guy, i think the fisherman, says the kids got killed 2 at a timeif this is true then it doesn't add up cos if there were 7 kids and 2 got killed at a time then the number of kids killed would have to be eveni might be wrong because i've seen the movie only once is this movie true cos me and my mates were fighting while we were watching itthis movie is good but it isn't that scary as people say it is
